‘America’s wolf’ among those rescued by Endangered Species Act: ‘Absolutely worth protecting’
From ABC7 News:
Of the many animals protected by the
Endangered Species Act, there may be no other species more American than red wolf.
Known as “America’s wolf,” red wolves are the only species of wolf that live in the United States and nowhere else on Earth. These uniquely American mammals are featured in
National Geographic Kids’ January edition.
